title: [POLL] Which Plushie is the best?

embed.description: The Riot Games merch store is here! Discover merch crafted to capture the spirit of League in every stitch and brushstroke, so you can carry a piece of your game wherever you go.

body:
Need help deciding which one to buy!
If not I might end up caving and having a plushie collection on my lounge.

replies.body: Assuming she actually has feet and isn't just a pyramid with arms and a head, I'd say Lulu is the best of the ones they have right now. But if it was me personally, I'd love a Vi.

Can't really tell from the pictures aye. 
The dress/robe seem to hovering above the ground, but can't confirm if that's due to feet or pyramid.
